def_cn: 生产（新产品）；（尤指）出版，推出（图书或CD）
def_en: When a person or company brings out a new product, especially a new book or CD, they produce it and put it on sale.

def_cn: 使（某种通常不易显露的行为或情感）显现；激发
def_en: Something that brings out a particular kind of behaviour or feeling in you causes you to show it, especially when it is something you do not normally show.
